name: What is what?
description:
Note:

if you're experiencing issues with the resolution, 

try changing your zoom settings from your browser.

This game was made  for the BTP Game Jam

(it is also our second game ever) 

Hope you enjoy playing it!

How it fits the theme:

In this game less is more, but also more can be less. 

Oh and left is right! Or was it right is left? 

I can't quite remember, right now down is up, 

and my head is upside down.

Credits:

The game is 100% original, 

meaning that the entirety of the assets 

and the music was made by us.

Programing & Game Desing 

by Carlos Astengo Macías (Paladinlvl100)

Art, Animations & Music 

by Anette de la Garza (kaarkless) 

IG: @elven.corpse

Current speedrun world record holder 

is realAkroma with 53.10 seconds
